metadata.name: Spola PASS
metadata.description: Spola PASS is a collection of utility NFTsâ€”a unique digital portrait and the crucial PASS living in Spola Labs Ecosystem, where holders will receive IRL benefits.  We define the Spola PASS as a ticket across the project journey that could participate in events including the Player Cultivation, Soccer Economy, and Branding Collaboration Campaign, composed of 4 levels, including OG-Platinum, OG-Gold, OGSilver and OG-Bronze.
